privacy_text:
Your privacy is important to us. We only collect data required for app functionality, such as activity statistics, nutrition logs, and account details. No personal data is shared with third parties.

We use secure authentication (Firebase) and encrypted connections. You have full control over your data and can delete your account at any time.
reauth_required: Re-authentication required. Please log in again.
about_text:
This app was created as a cross-platform fitness tracker and nutrition diary for daily healthy living. Our goal is to make activity and nutrition tracking simple and motivating.

Developed by Your Name, 2024.
support_success: Thank you for contacting us! We will get back to you soon.
login_password_short: Password must be at least 6 characters
login_error_invalid_credentials: Invalid credentials. Please check your email and password.
login_error_user_disabled: This account has been disabled. Please contact support.
login_error_too_many_requests: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
login_error_unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
login_error_user_not_found: No user found with this email.
login_reset_email_required: Enter your email to reset password
register_password_short: Password must be at least 6 characters
register_email_in_use: This email is already in use
splash_no_account: Don't have an account? Sign up
nutrition_goal_adjust_error_less: Must be less than current weight
nutrition_goal_adjust_error_more: Must be more than current weight
nutrition_goal_must_be_less: To lose weight, goal must be less than current weight.
nutrition_goal_must_be_more: To gain weight, goal must be more than current weight.
nutrition_intro_bmi_desc: BMI (Body Mass Index) is a number calculated from your height and weight. It helps us determine whether your weight is in a healthy range.
nutrition_bmr_tdee_desc:
â€¢ BMR (Basal Metabolic Rate) is the number of calories your body needs at rest.

â€¢ TDEE (Total Daily Energy Expenditure) includes your activity and shows the total calories you burn daily.

We use TDEE to calculate how much you should eat for your chosen goal.

nutrition_goal_recommend_lose: Your BMI indicates excess weight. We recommend a weight loss plan.
nutrition_goal_recommend_gain: Your BMI indicates underweight. We recommend a weight gain plan.
nutrition_goal_recommend_maintain: Your weight is within a normal range. We recommend maintaining it.
sync_health: Sync with Google Fit / Apple Health
faq_sync_title: How to sync with Google Fit or Apple Health?
faq_sync_body: Go to the 'Sync' section and grant the required permissions.
faq_profile_title: How do I change my profile data?
faq_profile_body: Tap on your profile section and then use the Edit button.
faq_signout_body: Scroll down and tap on the red Sign Out button.
about_app_desc: This app helps you monitor your physical activity and nutrition with ease. Track your steps, set personal goals, visualize your progress, and manage your daily calorie intake â€” all in one place. Integrated with Google Fit and Apple Health for seamless health data synchronization.
about_app_tech: Developed as a cross-platform mobile application using Flutter and Firebase. Created as part of a diploma project.
sign_out_confirm: Are you sure you want to sign out?
email_verification_not_verified: Email not verified. Please check your inbox.
